```{r}
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "imdb")
```

Make function to get number of productions of actor
```{r}
db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT movie_id) AS 'Number of movies acted in'
              FROM name n
              LEFT JOIN cast_info c ON n.id = c.person_id
              WHERE n.name = 'Cox, Laverne'
                ;")
```

```{sql}
CREATE FUNCTION get_num_movies
  @names AS TABLE 
  @cast_info AS TABLE
```
